author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37417.

#### PR validation:

The first commit is the original development and was tested with the case described in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37385. No further testing.
title: [12_2_X] Set concurrent lumis/IOVs in ConfigBuilder if their value is different from default regardless of the number of threads
